title: Global AI Race Shows Asia Leading as Stocks Start 2026 With Bang
summary: Asia’s technology stocks began 2026 on a tear, with investors betting their momentum and outperformance against US peers will last through the year.

title: Why India's savings culture serves everyone except the saver
summary: India’s love for fixed income isn’t just cultural—it’s structural. Banks and governments benefit, while savers quietly lose wealth to inflation, taxes, and time.
